name: Chief Operations Manager: Big Octopus (C.O.M.B.O.)
description:
Corporate needs you to pilot its state of the art Octopus! Wreak havoc on the city of squid-topia, and show those molluscs who's boss!

Run around the room to control the octopus. Hold 'I' to produce ink and increase your multiplier. If you fail to complete three events, its game over!
